ModToggled.Description: Allows you to turn the entire mod off, so you don't have to individually set everything to false. Leave this 'on' to use the mod.

MainPantrySpringCrops.Description: Choose between twistA, liteA, plusA, twistB, liteB, plusB, or false. Twist replaces some items with JA items. Lite adds options for JA items. Plus requires JA items. Options with A have adjusted rewards. Options with B have vanilla rewards (unadjusted).
MainPantrySpringCrops.AllowValues: twistA, liteA, plusA, twistB, liteB, plusB, false

MainPantrySummerCrops.Description: Choose between twistA1, twistA2, liteA1, liteA2, plusA1, plusA2, twistB1, twistB2, liteB1, liteB2, plusB1, plusB2, or false. Twist replaces some items with JA items. Lite adds options for JA items. Plus requires JA items. Options with A have adjusted rewards. Options with B have vanilla rewards (unadjusted). Option 1 is for raspberry (available starting in year 2). Option 2 is for wasabi root.
MainPantrySummerCrops.AllowValues: twistA1, twistA2, liteA1, liteA2, plusA1, plusA2, twistB1, twistB2, liteB1, liteB2, plusB1, plusB2, false

MainPantryFallCrops.Description: Choose between twistA, liteA, plusA, twistB, liteB, plusB, or false. Twist replaces some items with JA items. Lite adds options for JA items. Plus requires JA items. Options with A have adjusted rewards. Options with B have vanilla rewards (unadjusted).
MainPantryFallCrops.AllowValues: twistA, liteA, plusA, twistB, liteB, plusB, false

MainPantryQualityCrops.Description: Choose between twistA, liteA, plusA, twistB, liteB, plusB, or false. Twist replaces some items with JA items. Lite adds options for JA items. Plus requires JA items. Options with A have adjusted rewards. Options with B have vanilla rewards (unadjusted).
MainPantryQualityCrops.AllowValues: twistA, liteA, plusA, twistB, liteB, plusB, false

MainPantryArtisan.Description: Choose true (activated with some JA items) or false. The reward is the same as vanilla (unadjusted).

MainBulletinBoardChef.Description: Choose between twistA, liteA, plusA, twistB, liteB, plusB, or false. Twist replaces some items with JA items. Lite adds options for JA items. Plus requires JA items. Options with A have adjusted rewards. Options with B have vanilla rewards (unadjusted).
MainBulletinBoardChef.AllowValues: twistA, liteA, plusA, twistB, liteB, plusB, false

MainBulletinBoardDye.Description: Choose between twist, lite, plus, or false. Twist replaces some items with JA items. Lite adds options for JA items. Plus requires JA items. All options have vanilla rewards (unadjusted).

MainBulletinBoardFieldResearch.Description: Choose between twist, lite, plus, or false. Twist replaces some items with JA items. Lite adds options for JA items. Plus requires JA items. All options have vanilla rewards (unadjusted).

MainBulletinBoardFodder.Description: Choose between twistA, liteA, plusA, twistB, liteB, plusB, or false. Twist replaces some items with JA items. Lite adds options for JA items. Plus requires JA items. Options with A have adjusted rewards. Options with B have vanilla rewards (unadjusted).
MainBulletinBoardFodder.AllowValues: twistA, liteA, plusA, twistB, liteB, plusB, false

MainBulletinBoardEnchanter.Description: Choose between twist, lite, plus, or false. Twist replaces some items with JA items. Lite adds options for JA items. Plus requires JA items. All options have vanilla rewards (unadjusted).

ExtrasPantryAnimalBundle.Description: Choose true (activated) or false. The reward is the same as vanilla (unadjusted).

ExtrasCraftsRoomSpringForaging.Description: Choose true (activated) or false. The reward is the same as vanilla (unadjusted).

ExtrasCraftsRoomSummerForaging.Description: Choose true (activated) or false. The reward is the same as vanilla (unadjusted).

ExtrasCraftsRoomWinterForaging.Description: Choose true (activated) or false. The reward is the same as vanilla (unadjusted).

ExtrasCraftsRoomExoticForaging.Description: Choose true (activated) or false. The reward is the same as vanilla (unadjusted).

ExtrasCraftsRoomConstructionandCrafting.Description: Choose A (activated, adjusted reward), B (activated unadjusted reward, so same as vanilla), or false.

ExtrasBoilerRoomBlacksmith.Description: Choose A (activated, adjusted reward), B (activated unadjusted reward, so same as vanilla), or false.

ExtrasBoilerRoomGeologist.Description: Choose A (activated, adjusted reward), B (activated unadjusted reward, so same as vanilla), or false.

ExtrasBoilerRoomGemologist.Description: Choose A (activated, adjusted reward), B (activated unadjusted reward, so same as vanilla), or false.

ExtrasBoilerRoomGemologistRingReward.Description: If Gemologist option A is toggled, choose slime or magnet. If Gemologist option B is toggled, or Gemologist is not toggled (false), choose N/A.

ExtrasVault2500.Description: Choose true (activated, adjusted reward) or false.

ExtrasVault5000.Description: Choose true (activated, adjusted reward) or false.

ExtrasVault10000.Description: Choose true (activated, adjusted reward) or false.

ExtrasFishTankBeginnerFish.Description: Choose A (activated, adjusted reward), B (activated unadjusted reward, so same as vanilla), or false.

ExtrasFishTankIntermediateFish.Description: Choose A (activated, adjusted reward), B (activated unadjusted reward, so same as vanilla), or false.

ExtrasFishTankAdvancedFish.Description: Choose A (activated, adjusted reward), B (activated unadjusted reward, so same as vanilla), or false.

ExtrasFishTankSpecialtyFish.Description: Choose A (activated, adjusted reward), B (activated unadjusted reward, so same as vanilla), or false.
